items.question: What types of electrical wires does Delna Electricals offer?
items.answer: We offer household wiring, industrial wiring, flexible wires, flame-retardant (FR), and zero halogen flame-retardant (ZHFR) wires.

items.question: Are your electrical wires safe for home and industrial use?
items.answer: Yes, our wires meet the highest safety standards, ensuring high conductivity, heat resistance, and durability.

items.question: What types of electrical conduit pipes do you offer?
items.answer: We provide PVC conduit pipes, rigid conduit pipes, and flexible conduit pipes for various installations.

items.question: Can your conduit pipes be used for underground wiring?
items.answer: Yes, our rigid and heavy-duty conduit pipes offer excellent moisture and impact resistance.

items.question: What types of lighting solutions does Delna Electricals offer?
items.answer: We provide LED bulbs, panel lights, floodlights, and street lights designed for energy efficiency.

items.question: Are LED lights better than traditional bulbs?
items.answer: Yes, LED lights consume up to 80% less energy and have a longer lifespan.
